text: Hi all! Can I copy production pages into a sandbox account? How?

Pages in HS are built from database elements in real time, so no you cannot "copy" a page.  You can copy a page "template" if you want but not a built page.

If you want to simply make changes to your production pages and/or templates in a safe area, you should learn about content staging where you can safely work on production pages in a safe environment and then release them into production whenever you're ready:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-staging>

I failed to mention you can create a standard sandbox account from a production account, giving you a safe environment with access to live data - but I don't think this will "copy" your pages there.  But you can read about that here (requires Enterprise): <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account-management/set-up-a-HubSpot-standard-sandbox-account>
Hi Scott, thanks! Another question: So, What is the best practice to develop in local and deploy in a "test"  environment first, then in production?
